title: Login Issues with Hotmail account
content:
Hello, Basically I made a new Hotmail account to use for thunderbird and when I tried to add it, seems there is some sort of error. I think maybe its on Microsoft's side but not sure what I can do other then report it. I have outlined my steps in the images attached:

Step1 sign in Step2 put in password Step3 skip require recovery email Step4 Accept third party apps (Thunderbird) Step5 Account wont sign in or be added to thunderbird no matter what I do. I tried everything.

This thunderbird instances is up to date running on windows 11 machine and the hotmail account is brand new. I have two other emails on thunderbird but both are imap from my own domains. Thanks!
creator: hitmanjammer

title: Sending emails in Thunderbird
content: Hello, I have Thunderbird 115 on a Win10 HP laptop. Until today, I could both send and receive emails OK; today, I can only receive emails, for some unknown reason I have an error message with sending only, reading: "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.fastmail.com failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again." The SMTP settings match what is on Fastmail's website for POP3. I haven't done anything I can think of since last using Thunderbird that would trigger this. I have updated successfully to Thunderbird 128 OK and that hasn't solved the problem. The email provider is Fastmail (I've been in touch with them, they have given advice, so far, no luck), SMTP settings are on the attached image. The ISP is NBN (National Broadband Network). Antivirus software is McAfee Premium - Individual. It is really frustrating.
creator: john1180
